description._content: Image taken from: Title: "Yachting in the Arctic Seas, or, notes of five voyages ... in the neighbourhood of Spitzbergen and Novaya Zembya ... Edited and illustrated by W. Livesay" Author: LAMONT, James - F.G.S Contributor: LIVESAY, W. Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 10460.pp.1." Page: 260 Place of Publishing: London Date of Publishing: 1876 Issuance: monographic Identifier: 002061621 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals.
